timeline.bodyText: The null behaviors in this class are all over the place. endpointCertificateMetadata(String), containerEndpoints(String) ignores it, as does athenzDomain(AthenzDomain), while athenzDomain(String), and tlsSecretsKeyName(String) (correctly, IMO) resets the state.
timeline.author: freva

replies.bodyText: Yes, good point, I'll try to clean it up
replies.author: hmusum

timeline.message: Handle null value arguments to Builder methods better
